verses.verse: David<WH1732> assembled<WH6950> all the princes<WH8269> of Israel,<WH3478> the princes<WH8269> of the tribes,<WH7626> and the captains<WH8269> of the companies<WH4256> who served<WH8334> the king<WH4428> by division,<WH4256> and the captains<WH8269> of thousands,<WH505> and the captains<WH8269> of hundreds,<WH3967> and the rulers over all the substance<WH7399> and possessions<WH4735> of the king<WH4428> and of his sons,<WH1121> with the officers,<WH5631> and the mighty men,<WH1368> even all the mighty men<WH1368> of valor,<WH2428> to Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Then David<WH1732> the king<WH4428> stood up<WH6965> on his feet,<WH7272> and said,<WH559> "Hear<WH8085> me,<WH251> my brothers, and my people!<WH5971> As for me,<WH3824> it was in my heart to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> of rest<WH4496> for the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and for the footstool<WH1916> of our God;<WH430> and I had prepared<WH3559> for the building.<WH1129>
But God<WH430> said<WH559> to me,<WH1129> 'You shall not build a house<WH1004> for my name,<WH8034> because you are a man<WH376> of war,<WH4421> and have shed<WH8210> blood.<WH1818>'

However Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> chose<WH977> me out of all the house<WH1004> of my father<WH1> to be king<WH4428> over Israel<WH3478> forever.<WH5769> For he has chosen<WH977> Judah<WH3063> to be prince;<WH5057> and in the house<WH1004> of Judah,<WH3063> the house<WH1004> of my father;<WH1> and among the sons<WH1121> of my father<WH1> he took pleasure<WH7521> in me to make me king<WH4427> over all Israel.<WH3478>

Of all my sons<WH1121> (for Yahweh<WH3068> has given<WH5414> me many<WH7227> sons<WH1121>), he has chosen<WH977> Solomon<WH8010> my son<WH1121> to sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s kingdom<WH4438> over Israel.<WH3478>
He said<WH559> to me,<WH8010> 'Solomon, your son,<WH1121> shall build<WH1129> my house<WH1004> and my courts;<WH2691> for I have chosen<WH977> him to be my son,<WH1121> and I will be his father.<WH1>
I will establish<WH3559> his kingdom<WH4438> forever,<WH5769> if he continues<WH2388> to do<WH6213> my commandments<WH4687> and my ordinances,<WH4941> as at this day.<WH3117>'

Now therefore,<WH5869> in the sight of all Israel,<WH3478> the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and in the audience<WH241> of our God,<WH430> observe<WH8104> and seek<WH1875> out all the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God;<WH430> that you may possess<WH3423> this good<WH2896> land,<WH776> and leave it for an inheritance<WH5157> to your children<WH1121> after<WH310> you<WH5704> forever.<WH5769>

You,<WH8010> Solomon my son,<WH1121> know<WH3045> the God<WH430> of your father,<WH1> and serve<WH5647> him with a perfect<WH8003> heart<WH3820> and with a willing<WH2655> mind;<WH5315> for Yahweh<WH3068> searches<WH1875> all hearts,<WH3824> and understands<WH995> all the imaginations<WH3336> of the thoughts.<WH4284> If you seek<WH1875> him,<WH4672> he will be found by you;<WH5800> but if you forsake him,<WH2186> he will cast you off forever.<WH5703>
Take heed<WH7200> now;<WH3068> for Yahweh has chosen<WH977> you to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for the sanctuary.<WH4720> Be strong,<WH2388> and do it.<WH6213>"

Then David<WH1732> gave<WH5414> to Solomon<WH8010> his son<WH1121> the pattern<WH8403> of the porch<WH197> of the temple,<WH1004> and of its houses, and of its treasuries,<WH1597> and of the upper rooms<WH5944> of it,<WH6442> and of the inner rooms<WH2315> of it,<WH1004> and of the place of the mercy seat;<WH3727>

and the pattern<WH8403> of all that he had by the Spirit,<WH7307> for the courts<WH2691> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and for all the surrounding<WH5439> rooms,<WH3957> for the treasuries<WH214> of the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> and for the treasuries<WH214> of the dedicated things;<WH6944>

also for the divisions<WH4256> of the priests<WH3548> and the Levites,<WH3881> and for all the work<WH4399> of the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and for all the vessels<WH3627> of service<WH5656> in the house<WH1004> of Yahweh;<WH3068>

of gold<WH2091> by weight<WH4948> for the gold,<WH2091> for all vessels<WH3627> of every kind of service;<WH5656> for all the vessels<WH3627> of silver<WH3701> by weight,<WH4948> for all vessels<WH3627> of every kind of service;<WH5656>

by weight<WH4948> also for the lampstands<WH4501> of gold,<WH2091> and for its lamps,<WH5216> of gold,<WH2091> by weight<WH4948> for every lampstand<WH4501> and for its lamps;<WH5216> and for the lampstands<WH4501> of silver,<WH3701> by weight<WH4948> for every lampstand<WH4501> and for its lamps,<WH5216> according to the use<WH5656> of every lampstand;<WH4501>
and the gold<WH2091> by weight<WH4948> for the tables<WH7979> of show bread,<WH4635> for every table;<WH7979> and silver<WH3701> for the tables<WH7979> of silver;<WH3701>

and the forks,<WH4207> and the basins,<WH4219> and the cups,<WH4219> of pure<WH2889> gold;<WH2091> and for the golden<WH2091> bowls<WH3713> by weight<WH4948> for every bowl;<WH3713> and for the silver<WH3701> bowls by weight<WH4948> for every bowl;<WH3713>

and for the altar<WH4196> of incense<WH7004> refined<WH2212> gold<WH2091> by weight;<WH4948> and gold<WH2091> for the pattern<WH8403> of the chariot,<WH4818> the cherubim,<WH3742> that spread out,<WH6566> and covered<WH5526> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
"All this,<WH7919>" said David, "I have been made to understand in writing<WH3791> from the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh,<WH3068> even all the works<WH4399> of this pattern.<WH8403>"

David<WH1732> said<WH559> to Solomon<WH8010> his son,<WH1121> "Be strong<WH2388> and courageous,<WH553> and do<WH6213> it.<WH3372> Don't be afraid, nor be dismayed;<WH2865> for Yahweh<WH3068> God,<WH430> even my God,<WH430> is with you.<WH7503> He will not fail you,<WH5800> nor forsake you,<WH4399> until all the work for the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> is finished.<WH3615>

Behold,<WH4256> there are the divisions of the priests<WH3548> and the Levites,<WH3881> for all the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430> There shall be with you in all kinds of work<WH4399> every willing<WH5081> man<WH2451> who has skill,<WH5656> for any kind of service. Also the captains<WH8269> and all the people<WH5971> will be entirely at your command.<WH1697>"
